name: vscode-debug-webhook
description: Sends a webhook notification when debug session pauses or ends.

debugWebhook.url.description: The webhook URL to call on debug events.

debugWebhook.ignoreStepEvents.description: Whether to ignore 'step' events (stepping over/into code) to avoid spam.

debugWebhook.notifyTerminalCommands.description: Whether to send a notification when a terminal command finishes.

debugWebhook.commandFilterRegex.description: Regex pattern to filter terminal commands (e.g., '^python' to only match python commands). Leave empty to match all.
